body:
Hi! I got this strange error while I tried importing idf using 'import idf' component. Any clues? ANy help in this regard will be much appreciated.



[Importidf%20error.PNG](http://api.ning.com:80/files/ZBU*wpq9SCjV6AhAHp-7YqFulFKNErH4A90lXH36*AtcxHTHReBJ8-H3sn*X6wawlfR5e1KU4GSF6v12mMIrl0ngPT81lh2U/Importidferror.PNG)

replies.body:
The _idfFile input should be the file path and not a boolean.

-A.

Hi Abraham,



Thanks! It was too silly of me!



Regards,

Ram
